text:
@maddow People are not getting it ....
Out of the 1,578,662 CONFIRMED #Covid_19 cases
94,832, that's NINETY-FOUR THOUSAND, EIGHT HUNDRED AND THIRTY-TWO CONFIRMED DEATHS.
🤔hmm? only one out of three people who get CORONAVIRUS have survived🤔
😲As I wrote this tweet 70 people DIED! 94902
